text: “Mba tugen nzan nzɨgi, mbe wari tɨgap kav, mbe panara thav wari won ŋgugage Zosep gari. Mbe panara thav, ana garav, mbaram ana thumkegap, ana ndim harigi ŋgui ga nɨɨŋgi. Mbe ana mbe ndɨɨim, mbe ana vhezgiap, ana ndigap, vov Idzɨvan ana ndim mbaim, mbe vhɨra Idzɨvan ana vhezgi. Mba tugen, mbe maaŋ Zosep ga mbuim, Fhe Bakɨme Zosep phorga ki.
